entities.name: xenophilius
entities.description: Xenophilius is a person who is trying to get through the debris on the stairs, making noise and causing distractions. ("Xenophilius gave a wail of fear and despair. There were scurryings and scrapings: Xenophilius was trying to get though the debris on the stairs.")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is helping Ron escape from under the wreckage. ("He stated to dig himself out under cover of all the noise Xenophilius was making on the staircase.")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is buried deepest under the wreckage. ("Ron was buried deepest: Harry and Hermione climbed, as quietly as they could, over all the wreckage to where he lay,")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a person who helps Ron escape from under the wreckage using a Hover Charm. ("Hermione managed to free Ron with the use of a Hover Charm.")

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak is an object that Hermione asks Harry to give her. ("Okay then, Hermione whispered, 'give me the Invisibility Cloak.")

relationships.description: Harry helps Ron escape from under the wreckage. ("He stated to dig himself out under cover of all the noise Xenophilius was making on the staircase.")
Hermione helps Ron escape from under the wreckage using a Hover Charm. ("Hermione managed to free Ron with the use of a Hover Charm.")
Hermione trusts Harry, as evidenced by her asking him for the Invisibility Cloak. ("All right," breathed Hermione, "Do you trust me, Harry?")
Harry gives the Invisibility Cloak to Hermione. ("Okay then," whispered Hermione, "give me the Invisibility Cloak.")
